attributes.additional_details: This Idea Could Be Something Like Germanies Monthly Pass Which Goes For £43 And Offers Unlimited Travel (On Trains) For The Month
attributes.background: I would like Government / Parliment To Discuss This As I Believe it Would Help Lower Carbon Emmissions (As Less People Will Feel The Need To Drive) And There May Be Less Strikes As If The Income From Trains Rise More Of The Profits Will Be Able To Go To The TFL And Drivers

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Introduce 'Deutschland-Ticket'-style monthly public transport ticket for £40-45
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636235

Or, if you would like to call for train ticket prices to be reformed in a different way to the above petition, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you want.
